# Load Data 

```{r, message=FALSE}

Exams
```
# Examine Average Grades of Different Exams

```{r}
table(Exams$Exam)

boxplot(Grade~Exam,data=Exams)

mean(Grade~Exam,data=Exams)
sd(Grade~Exam,data=Exams)
```
